terms.title: Terms of Service

terms.section2Item4: Create personalized action plans for professional development

terms.section6Item2: Provide suggestions based on AI analysis, which may not be perfect

terms.section6Item4: Depend on the quality of information provided by the user

You can cancel your subscription at any time, maintaining access until the end of the paid period. Refunds are evaluated on a case-by-case basis according to our refund policy.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Text: VagaJusta ("we", "our" or "company") is committed to protecting the privacy of our platform users. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, store and protect your personal information when you use our resume and career analysis services.
privacy.section2Text: We collect the following categories of information:
privacy.section2Item1: Registration data: name, email and encrypted password
privacy.section2Item2: Resumes: PDF documents submitted for analysis
privacy.section2Item3: Job data: job descriptions provided for comparison
privacy.section2Item4: Usage data: platform interactions, analysis history
privacy.section2Item5: Technical data: IP address, browser type, device
privacy.section3Item3: Create action plans for your career
privacy.section3Item5: Send communications about your account (if authorized)
privacy.section4Text: We do not sell your data. Your personal information and resumes are not shared with third parties for marketing or recruitment purposes. We may share data only with:
privacy.section4Item1: Infrastructure providers (hosting, database) under confidentiality contracts
privacy.section4Item2: Legal authorities, when required by law
privacy.section5Text: Your data is stored on secure servers with encryption at rest and in transit. We implement technical and organizational measures to protect against unauthorized access, loss or alteration of data. Resumes are processed and stored securely and can be deleted at any time by the user.
privacy.section6Text: According to data protection laws, you have the right to:
privacy.section7Text: We use essential cookies for platform operation and analytical cookies to understand how our services are used. You can manage your cookie preferences in your browser settings.
privacy.section8Text: We keep your data for as long as necessary to provide our services or as required by law. Accounts inactive for more than 2 years may have data deleted after prior notification.
privacy.section9Text: For privacy questions or to exercise your rights, contact:
privacy.section10Text: This policy may be updated periodically. We will notify you of significant changes by email or through the platform.

help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: Find answers to your questions or contact us
help.legalDocsDesc: Check our privacy policy and terms of service
help.faq1Answer: Our AI analyzes your resume by comparing it with market best practices and, when you provide a job, compares your qualifications with specific requirements to calculate your compatibility score.
help.faq2Answer: Yes! We use end-to-end encryption and do not share your data with third parties. Your resumes are processed securely and you can delete them at any time.
help.faq3Answer: ATS (Applicant Tracking System) are systems used by companies to automatically filter resumes. Our ATS resume is optimized to pass these filters, using appropriate keywords and formatting.
help.faq4Question: How does the free plan work?
help.faq4Answer: The free plan allows 3 analyses per month, access to the base ATS resume and 14-day action plan. You can upgrade to the Pro plan at any time for unlimited resources.
help.faq5Question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
help.faq5Answer: Yes! You can cancel your Pro subscription at any time. Your access continues until the end of the already paid period.
help.faq6Question: How does career transition mode work?
help.faq6Answer: This mode adapts your resume to highlight transferable skills, personal projects and relevant experiences for your new desired field, even if you don't have direct experience in it.
